description.value:
Grants +20 to Interrogation Tests, and it being present gains +30 to Intimidate Tests. If used on a subject, they suffer -20 to Deceive Tests while being interrogated.

Requirements

Inflicts horrific pain without leaving permenant damage. Often used by Inquisitors.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: 375 T
